ResetPassword.enter-username-prompt: Next, give us the Guardos username you're having trouble with
ResetPassword.email-sent-failure: Please check your inbox for an email regarding password recovery, and also review your spam folder. The email contains a link that will remain valid for 15 minutes.
ResetPassword.retry-recovery-link: Please try again to get a recovery link. If the Error appears one more time, please contact us.
